text: waldhy qal liwalidayh 'iidh dewah 'iilaa al'iiman biallah wal'iqrar balbeth: qbhana lakuma ateidanny 'an 'ukhrj min qbry hyana, waqad madat alqurun min al'umam min qbly, fhlku falam yubeth minhum ahd? wwaldah ysalan allah hdayth qaylayn lh: wylk, aman wsddiq waeml salhana, 'iina waed allah balbeth haqa la shaka fyh, fayaqul lhma: ma hdha aldhy tqwlanh 'iilaa ma sttarh al'awalun min alabatyl, mnqwl min ktbhm
